name: performance_stats_for_past_predictions
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool football_prediction.
Tool description: The Football Prediction API provides predictions for upcoming football matches, average bookie odds, results for past matches and prediction performance statistics for past results.
API description: Returns information about the accuracy of past predictions. (in the last day, 7 days, 14 days and 30 days) Can be additionally filtered by federation and market. If no market filter is provided it defaults to classic

federation.description: Filter statistics by a specific federation. Defaults to None.

market.description: Show stats for a different prediction market. Defaults to "classic" if not provided
